name: Typography Grid and Layout Design
description:
You'll learn how to choose your fonts and layout a perfect design for your text that is pleasing to the eye and has high readability because that's where creating beautiful layouts starts: with typography.


‚ÄúA grid is only useful if it is derived from the material it is intended to handle"

- Derek Birdsall, designer


Before starting your design, you must have a basic understanding of how typography, fonts and paragraphs work. In this file, you can look at fonts, styles, and sizes.


Learnings

  • The elements of a grid
  • Working with column
  • Designing posters with a grid
  • You can use grids in other design projects


Behind the scenes, in case you want to know more.

  • Artboard Size - A4 Paper
  • Grid: 6 Cols, 6 Rows
  • Margin: 40px
  • Gutter: 20px
  • Body Typeface: Mukta Vaani
  • Heading Typeface: Tiempos Headline
